aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro2: VIETNAMESE HOME-STYLE RICE RESTAURANT IN HANOI.
aboutUs.p1: At Long Quân An, our philosophy is simple: share the flavors and culture of Vietnamese rice with everyone. We do this by using the freshest ingredients and crafting each dish with care by our dedicated chefs.
aboutUs.p2: The dining space at Long Quân An is inspired by traditional Vietnamese values blended with modern touches, creating a nostalgic yet refreshing atmosphere.
aboutUs.p3: With wood and greenery as the main elements—closest to nature—your dining experience will feel truly distinctive!
